attributes.action: call on the Football Associations of England, Scotland, Wales & Northern Ireland to enter into a home nations league tournament of home & away games to take place during Summer 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This could take place at the same time as the Euro 2008 so we solve the problem of summer 2008.  The economy will get a massive boost, promote some healthy rivalry and England will win something!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
